Frequently Asked Questions

Can I cancel my plan anytime?

Yes, you can cancel your plan at any time. Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing cycle, and you wont be charged for the next one.

What happens if I run out of credits mid-month?

If you use up your credits before the month ends, you can either upgrade to a higher plan or purchase additional credits through our add-on options.

What are add-ons, and how do they work?

In addition to your regular subscription, you can boost your account with two types of add-ons:

  • Generative Credits: Extra credits for Generative clip videos
  • Power-Up: A multiplier of your current plan that includes AI video duration and AI Images & Premium Stock assets

These renew monthly based on your billing cycle.

Do unused credits roll over to the next month? And do I get all credits upfront on a yearly plan?

Unused credits do not roll overthey reset at the start of each billing cycle. This applies to both monthly and yearly plans. If you're on a yearly plan, youll still receive credits on a monthly basis, but you get 25% off the total annual cost.

Can I purchase add-ons without a subscription?

No, add-ons are only available to users with an active subscription plan.
